title: Why the second speaker doesn't work on pixel 3 in ringtone? How to enable it for ringtone?
content:
The second speaker on pixel 3 doesn't work in ringtone. Sometimes it is not audible, the sound is very low and not clear too.
Please tell me how to enable the second speaker for ringtone too.
or
Just solve the issue with an update.

The sound is seriously very low.
